title: How much will the New Horizon Bundle cost?
body:
I own all the champions in the bundle

I'm asking because I just need my wallet ready :D

EDIT: If I post it in the wrong board please say so (I'm really bad on deciding where to post it)

replies.body:
Ehhhhh this board can work for this kind of question I suppose xP.

I don't yet have the exact cost of it yet, but if you do own all of the champions it *will* be discounted so that you're only paying for the skins.
